project_description: A comprehensive management system for Kafkas Göçmenleri Derneği (Caucasian Immigrants Association) that manages donations, members, social aid, and beneficiary tracking.

requirements.title: User Authentication
requirements.description: Users should be able to log in to the management panel
acceptance_criteria: User can access login page at /giris
User can enter email and password
User is redirected to dashboard after successful login
Mock authentication accepts any email with 6+ character password

requirements.title: Dashboard Overview
requirements.description: Users should see an overview dashboard with statistics and charts

requirements.title: Donations Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to view and manage donations
acceptance_criteria: Can filter donations by status and purpose

requirements.title: Members Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to view and manage members

requirements.title: Social Aid Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to manage social aid beneficiaries and applications

requirements.title: Navigation and Layout
requirements.description: Users should be able to navigate through the application
acceptance_criteria: Sidebar is visible on dashboard pages
Mobile menu works on small screens

requirements.title: Data Tables
requirements.description: Data tables should support filtering, sorting, and pagination
acceptance_criteria: Empty states display when no data
